ComicInfo.Series: Night of the Living Dead: Death Valley
ComicInfo.Summary:
A new night of terror is about to begin! Surrounded by crazed, flesh-hungry zombies, a group of California free spirits have only a campfire as defense from the cannibalistic ghouls who populate Death Valley. One by one, they begin to fall, torn to shreds and eaten before the eyes of their terrified friends. But the true horror is yet to begin. As the survivors make a valiant effort to escape their attackers in dune buggies, theyâ€™ll find that the open highway holds a shocking surprise that none of them could have expected, an evil that far outweighs the living dead who follow them in hot pursuit. In this valley, all roads lead to death!
